newzik.components.login.title: Newzik Login
newzik.components.login.loginError: Wrong password. Try again or click Forgot password to reset it.
newzik.components.login.invalidScopeErro: You cannot sign in with this account for the requested scope and app.
newzik.components.login.unknownError: An unexpected error occured, please retry later.
newzik.components.login.appDownload: Download it for free on the AppStore
newzik.components.login.privacyInfo: By submitting the above information, you will be able to receive music scores in a digital format. To do so and in compliance with the current legislation surrounding data protection, SYNCSING will handle your data to manage your account and demands. You can ask to access the information we have about you, rectify or delete it, oppose to its handling by SYNCSING, or ask for its portability. To exercise these rights, you can contact SYNCSING at the following address: contact@newzik.com We also remind you than you can define some measures about how your data should be handled after you’ve passed away. For more information, please go and see our confidentiality policy:
newzik.components.forgot.title: Forgot your password ?
newzik.components.forgot.content: Please write below your email address associated to your Newzik account and we will send you a new password.
newzik.components.forgot.note: Please note that doing so we will log you out from your Newzik account on all your devices.
newzik.components.forgot.successContent: We have sent you your new password at {property}
newzik.components.forgot.failureContent: Sorry, we don't know this email. Please try again.
newzik.components.permissions.title: {property} is asking permissions relating to your Newzik account
newzik.components.permissions.contentAcc: Access to Newzik account email and username
newzik.components.permissions.contentPos: Possibility to send bought or rented scores to your Newzik account
newzik.components.permissions.confirm: Not you? Log in to a different account
newzik.utils.validator.formatPassword: At least 8 characters with number, uppercase and lowercase characters
newzik.utils.validator.greaterThanLicens: The new value cannot be inferior to the previous number of licences
newzik.utils.validator.greaterThanPerfor: The new value cannot be inferior to the previous number of performances
